alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Mason (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 6:28PM EDT until July 27 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Mason County in western West Virginia... Southern Jackson County in northwestern West Virginia... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 627 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Ripley to 6 miles south of Point Pleasant, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kenna, Leon, Southside, Grimms Landing, Fairplain, and Given. This includes Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 126 and 134. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
